author: ethdreamer
content: idk if this has been mentioned before.. but I'm in favor of renaming `process_execution_payload()` to something else.. like `process_execution_payload_envelope()` or something just to avoid confusing with the already existing `process_execution_payload()` since this function is very different.

author: ethdreamer
content: of course there is *some* overlap but any attempts to share code between these functions would almost certainly make the code much less readable so I'm pretty confident this is going to be a different function in most clients
